00017 #define INFO(...) debug_wait(); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, "%s: %u: ", get_timestamp(), (unsigned int)pthread_self()); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, __VA_ARGS__); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, "\n"); fflush(TAGFS_DATA->logfile); debug_post()

00019 #define DEBUG(...) debug_wait(); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, "%u: DEBUG: ", (unsigned int)pthread_self()); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, __VA_ARGS__); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, "\n"); fflush(TAGFS_DATA->logfile); debug_post()

00022 
00023 #define ERROR(...) debug_wait(); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, "%u: %s(%d): ERROR: ", (unsigned int)pthread_self(), __FILE__, __LINE__); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, __VA_ARGS__); fprintf(TAGFS_DATA->logfile, "\n"); fflush(TAGFS_DATA->logfile); debug_post(); exit(EXIT_FAILURE)
